name: Star Prince Dress up game
description:
Dress up the Star Prince and help him find love! 
Prince Aurelian of the Minerva has received an invitation to a royal ball on Mars! The only problem? His crush is there...and last time they saw each other? He was ignored! Help him catch the eye of the Prince of Mars with a truly intergalactic outfit!

To play: Drag each article of clothing to the doll, mix and match to find your favourite combination! When playing in story mode, click to continue, read along, and enjoy!

★ We recommend playing on a computer, as there are some graphical glitches the occur when playing on a touchscreen device.

Please look forward to more dress up games and paper dolls in the future, and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for updates!
